ssot__EngagementAnalysisTextDirectFeedba.name: Engagement Analysis Text Direct Feedback
ssot__EngagementAnalysisTextDirectFeedba.description: The Engagement Analysis Text Direct Feedback DMO represents the feedback on a part of an engagement session being analyzed. For example, a user can give a numeric rating of the engagement in a survey.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the direct feedback was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is the name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__Id__c.description: The identifier of the engagement analysis text direct feedback record.

ssot__EngagementAnalysisTextId__c.description: The identifier of the specific engagement within the session.

ssot__EngagementChannelSourceType__c.description: The type of engagement channel source.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the data record.
